title: I.Sicily inscription 001211
support: Small stele, well polished, with a more expanded base bulb, rough, smoothed on the front face. The upper right corner is chipped

provenanceFound._: The place, date and circumstances of the discovery are unknown. Kaibel, gave it as existing in Lipari, Salinas had it transferred to Palermo in the archaeological museum, where it was already at the time of Libertini, and where it remained until 1965, when it was brought back to Museo Archeologico Eoliano. Possible that it was found around 1879 in the excavation of twenty graves carried out by Scolarici in his property in contrada Diana

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

repository._: Museo Archeologico Regionale Eoliano "Luigi Bernab� Brea"

museum.name: Museo Archeologico Regionale Eoliano "Luigi Bernab� Brea"
museum.description: The enormous collection is displayed in several neighbouring buildings, each with a particular focus: Prehistory, Prehistory of the minor islands, Epigraphy, Geology, the Classical period and later. The finds come from across the Aeolian islands, under the sea that surrounds them, and from the site of Milazzo on Sicily. One of the 3 largest Sicilian collections, it is truly comprehensive in scope and contains a few finds (e.g. the terracotta tragic theatre masks) that are near unique

bibl.title: Inscriptiones Graecae Siciliae et Italiae, additis graecis Galliae Hispaniae, Britanniae, Germaniae inscriptionibus
bibl.citation: G. Kaibel, Inscriptiones Graecae Siciliae et Italiae, Additis Graecis Galliae Hispaniae, Britanniae, Germaniae Inscriptionibus, Inscriptiones Graecae Consilio et Auctoritate Academiae Litterarum Regiae Borussicae Editae. Volumen XIV., XIV (Berlin: Georgius Reimerus, 1890)

bibl.citation: L. Bernabò Brea, M. Cavalier, and L. Campagna, Meligunìs Lipára. XII. Le Iscrizioni Lapidarie Greche e Latine Delle Isole Eolie (Palermo: Mario Grispo Editore, 2003)

bibl.author: Libertini
bibl.title: Le isole eolie nell'antichità greca e romana. Ricerche storiche ed archeologiche
